extension.dc:title: CoL Name Relations
extension.name: NameRelations
extension.dc:description: Support for nomenclatural name relations to be used in a Taxon core DwC archive, specifying a directed relation from the core name to a related name.

property.name: relatedNameUsageID
property.dc:description: An identifier for the related name this relation points to.

property.name: relationType
property.dc:description: The kind of directed name relation, usually pointing back in time.

property.name: publishedIn
property.dc:description: The citation of the publication that established the relationship, e.g. emended a name

property.name: publishedInID
property.dc:description: An identifier for the publication that established the relationship, e.g. emended a name
